Title: Bubbles In WPF
Description:
Bubbles game clone.
Written in WPF, MVVM pattern applied.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Bubbles is a game, written in C#, based on WPF.

It is design with MVVM pattern, all game animation effects are driven by data binding and notification.
